field.name: package
field.label: Select Category*
field.description: Select the content package to use for this slider. Create a new package in the WBTY Gallery Component.
field.query: SELECT id, title FROM #__categories WHERE published=1 AND extension='com_wbty_gallery' ORDER BY title ASC

field.name: includeJquery
field.label: Include jQuery
field.description: jQuery is required, but may already be included in your template.

field.name: jqueryMethod
field.label: Load jQuery Method
field.description: Load a local or CDN version?

field.name: width
field.label: Width
field.description: Width of Slider

field.name: height
field.label: Height
field.description: Height of Slider - leave empty for auto height

field.name: fx
field.label: Animation Type
field.description: Sets the transition between slides

field.name: timeout
field.label: Slide Timeout
field.description: Time between slide changes

field.name: speed
field.label: Transition Speed
field.description: Transition Speed

field.name: delay
field.label: First Delay
field.description: Additional delay applied to the first transition

field.name: fit
field.label: Fit Contents
field.description: Set to yes if you wish to have your photos automatically resize to the given slideshow width and height.

field.name: buildArrows
field.label: Include Navigation Arrows
field.description: If true, builds the forwards and backwards buttons

field.name: buildNavigation
field.label: Include Navigation
field.description: If true, builds a list of anchor links to link to each panel

field.name: buildThumbs
field.label: Include Thumbnails
field.description: If true, builds a list of thumbnails that act as a navigation

field.name: displayCaption
field.label: Display Caption
field.description: If yes, the description for the content will display as a caption

field.name: pause
field.label: Pause on Hover
field.description: If true and the slideshow is active, the slideshow will pause on hover

field.name: ordering
field.label: Ordering
field.description: How should the slides be ordered?

field.name: linkTarget
field.label: Link Target
field.description: Where should links point?

field.name: theme
field.label: Theme
field.description: Use the component to add new themes.

field.name: customCSS
field.label: Custom CSS Styles
field.description: Enter any custom CSS. Global CSS styles set in component will be added before these styles, so you can override for this particular module in this area, but the global will be added even if you enter information here.

field.name: resizeContents
field.label: Resize Contents
field.description: If true, solitary images/objects in the panel will expand to fit the viewport

field.name: borderTop
field.label: Top Border
field.description: Select the image you want to use as the top border for the slideshow

field.name: borderTopWidth
field.label: Top Border Width
field.description: Width of the top border. Leave blank for full-width.

field.name: borderTopHeight
field.label: Top Border Height
field.description: Height of top border

field.name: borderBottom
field.label: Bottom Border
field.description: Select the image you want to use as the bottom border for the slideshow

field.name: borderBottomWidth
field.label: Bottom Border Width
field.description: Width of the bottom border. Leave blank for full-width.

field.name: borderBottomHeight
field.label: Bottom Border Height
field.description: Height of bottom border
